intro.description: It is now time to implement the features. The implementation details depend on the composer you have chosen. Please select the task that explains the implementation for the composer you have chosen during project creation.

item.title: Create new cpp files

subitem.label: Now create more cpp files. Create one in each of the directories "Beautiful", "Wonderful" and "World". In these cases, activate the option "Refines" in the Wizard. Furthermore, all the cpp files must have the same name Main.
